      Parameters:

    • makeUpdateStrategyAlgo

      public AConfigBallAlgo makeUpdateStrategyAlgo(String classname)
      Returns an IBallAlgo that can instantiate the strategy specified by classname and install it into the host ball by composing it with any existing update strategy in the ball. Installs an error strategy if classname is null or other error occurs during the loading process. The toString() of the returned algorithm is the given classname.
      Parameters:
      classname - Shortened name of desired strategy
      Returns:
      An algorithm to install the specified strategy

    • makePaintStrategyAlgo

      public AConfigBallAlgo makePaintStrategyAlgo(String classname)
      Returns an IBallAlgo that can instantiate the strategy specified by classname and install it into the host ball by composing it with any existing paint strategy in the ball. Installs an error strategy if classname is null or other error occurs during the loading process. The toString() of the returned algorithm is the given classname.
      Parameters:
      classname - Shortened name of desired strategy
      Returns:
      An algorithm to install the specified strategy

    • makeCriteriaStrategyAlgo

      public AConfigBallAlgo makeCriteriaStrategyAlgo(String classname)
      Returns an IBallAlgo that can instantiate the strategy specified by classname and install it into the host ball by composing it with any existing criteria strategy in the ball. Installs an error strategy if classname is null or other error occurs during the loading process. The toString() of the returned algorithm is the given classname.
      Parameters:
      classname - Shortened name of desired strategy
      Returns:
      An algorithm to install the specified strategy

    • makeInteractStrategyAlgo

      public AConfigBallAlgo makeInteractStrategyAlgo(String classname)
      Returns an IBallAlgo that can instantiate the strategy specified by classname and install it into the host ball by composing it with any existing interact strategy in the ball. Installs an error strategy if classname is null or other error occurs during the loading process. The toString() of the returned algorithm is the given classname.
      Parameters:
      classname - Shortened name of desired strategy
      Returns:
      An algorithm to install the specified strategy

    • makeConfigBallAlgo

      public AConfigBallAlgo makeConfigBallAlgo(String classname)
      Returns an AConfigBallAlgo specified by classname and install it into the host ball by composing it with any existing interact strategy in the ball. Installs an error strategy if classname is null or other error occurs during the loading process. The toString() of the returned algorithm is the given classname.
      Parameters:
      classname - Shortened name of desired AConfigBallAlgo
      Returns:
      An AConfigBallAlgo

    • makeBallFactory

      public IBallFactory makeBallFactory(String classname)
      Returns an IBall factory specified by classname and install it into the host ball by composing it with any existing interact strategy in the ball. Installs an error strategy if classname is null or other error occurs during the loading process. The toString() of the returned algorithm is the given classname.
      Parameters:
      classname - Shortened name of desired AConfigBallAlgo
      Returns:
      An IBallFactory

    • combineStrategyAlgos

      public AConfigBallAlgo combineStrategyAlgos(AConfigBallAlgo ballAlgo1, AConfigBallAlgo ballAlgo2)
      Returns a composite IBallAlgo that can instantiate a composition with the two strategies made by the two given IUpdateStrategyFac objects. Returns null if either supplied factory is null. The toString() of the returned factory is the toString()s of the two given factories, concatenated with "-". If either given algo is null, then an algo that installs an error strategy is returned.
      Parameters:
      ballAlgo1 - A ball processing algorithm
      ballAlgo2 - Another ball processing algorithm
      Returns:
      An IBallAlgo that is a composition of the two algorithms
